author: The Spiffing Brit
description:
Welcome to Borderlands 4 its the next game in the perfectly balanced borderlands series. Famous for featuring no bugs glitches or exploits. As some of you may no I love breaking games and one of my favourite games to break is borderlands 1 and 2 because well nostalgia and they are very silly. Now I have had access to borderlands 4 for a while to playtest the game and get a feel for it. My first experience was earlier this year at a preview event where yes I discovered a few exploits. They were of course all patched by the dastardly developers :D 

Still here we are at the release of a new borderlands game with a sponsored stream where myself @TubboLIVE @bekyamon and @MrRoflWaffles are playing borderlands together! This is probably not the collaboration you expected to see but thanks to the magic of marketing budgets anything is possible :) 
The stream is a lovely open ended just have fun and play the game for a few hours sponsored stream which should be very easy with our lovely compa
title: I got Paid to playtest Borderlands 4 (Perfectly Balanced) - Ft Tubbo, Bekyamon & MrRoflwaffles #ad
